ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] new topic ;)
ygData.msgSnippet: well with us it merely depends on how many points you have in our loot system.  last night a bard got a white scale off gorenaire and a warrior got a red scale
ygData.messageBody:
well with us it merely depends on how many points you have in our loot
system. last night a bard got a white scale off gorenaire and a warrior got
a red scale off talendor. i'm in no rush to get one, the pieces will come
as they come.

Shada

p.s. i got the killing blow on VS once, but not Trak... yet =p

> /em raises hand
>
> Lots and lots of Warriors on Bertox but very few Bards. I
> think I've seen
> about a ten or so post-50.
>
> I could see Prophecy doing it *easily*, but if they're smart,
> they'll outfit
> their warriors first. And before I'm flamed for not
> supporting my fellow
> Bards... in a group/raid situation, the Warrior quest weapon
> is going to be
> far more useful than the Singing Short Sword. Our primary
> function at those
> events is resists/mana/regen. When was the last time you saw
> a Bard wading
> in and delivering the killing blow to Trak? ;)
